Types of Dandruff:
1. Dry Dandruff (tiny white flakes, dry scalp)
 Caused by: Dry scalp, cold weather, harsh shampoosSymptoms: Mild itching, flakes fall easily
2. Oily/Seborrheic Dandruff (greasy yellow flakes)
 Caused by: Excess scalp oil + yeast (Malassezia)Symptoms: Red, inflamed, itchy scalp
3. Product-Buildup Dandruff (residue from hair products)
Caused by: Gels, sprays, or oils left on scalpSymptoms: Itchy, waxy scalp after applying products
